ad_text: Averitt Careers Sponsored No matter where you are in your truck driving career, Averitt has opportunities for you. From CDL-A training to retirement, we offer the pay, benefits, and support you need to create a partnership that lasts. For every stage, in your life and your career, choose Averitt!

Averitt Careers Sponsored At Averitt, we know that as life changes, the needs of our professional truck drivers change too. Our wide variety of CDL-A opportunities offer top pay, benefits, and support for wherever you are in your career and in your life ¬— Because we want to grow with you!
